Mailing Address: c/o KidsCan Therapy Services9 - 3151 Lakeshore Rd, Suite #221Kelowna, BC     V1W 3S9
Service Details: - Offers occupational therapy assessment and intervention for children and youth who are having difficulty participating in the 'occupations'  of daily life- Experience with 'invisible disabilities' such as Autism Spectrum Disorder, Developmental Coordination Disorder/Delay, Sensory Processing Disorder and Non-Verbal Learning Disabilities- Provides assessments: sensory and motor skills, life skills, printing, writing, keyboarding accessibility- Provides rehabilitation: individual and group, functional programs- Offers consultation and caregiver coaching: modifications, and accommodations, participation in program planning conferences, liaison and referral- Provides health promotion: advocacy, support to self help groups
Hours: 8:30am - 4:30pm (extended hours can be arranged by special request)
Cost: Fee for Service - may be funded by government or other sources
Address & Map: Quest Marital Arts Studio (Temporary)1634 Harvey Ave, #108Kelowna, BC     V1Y 6G2
